price: Akasema: Enyi watu wangu! Mimi simo katika upotofu, lakini mimi ni Mtume nitokaye kwa Mola Mlezi wa viumbe vyote.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لَيۡسَ بِي ضَلَٰلَةٞ وَلَٰكِنِّي رَسُولٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: Nuhu akawaambia kukataa yale waliyo msingizia: Mimi sina upotofu kama mnavyo dai. Lakini mimi ni Mtume niliye toka kwa Muumba wa viumbe vyote, basi hayumkini awe mbali na haki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi laysa bī ḍalālatun walākinnī rasūlun min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
